short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Doit List-Effortlessly organizes your daily tasks, ensuring you never overlook those crucial yet easily forgotten tasks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
manage your daily tasks with Doit List, the must-have Chrome extension that empowers you to effortlessly organize your day. Never again will you overlook those crucial yet easily forgotten details that hold significance for you. With Doit List by your side, your task management becomes a breeze, ensuring you stay on top of your to-do list with ease and efficiency.

By clicking “Add to Chrome”, you accept and agree to the following:
-Installing "Doit List" extension
-Setting the Chrome™ New Tab search to Microsoft Bing
-Monetize Engine's privacy policy and terms of use

Privacy Policy: https://monetizengine.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of Use: https://monetizengine.com/terms-and-conditions/


You may uninstall the Doit List extension anytime
To remove our extension from your browser:

1) Click on the three dots in the upper right corner of your browser
2) Go to "Settings"
3) Click on "Extensions" in the left menu that appears
4) From the list of installed Extensions, locate the extension you would like to uninstall
